mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ID, CHILD_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR,ORDER_INDEX
mapper.delete: delete from ecm_relation where CHILD_ID = #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and NAME=#{relationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ecm_relation
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILD_ID = #{childId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_INDEX = #{orderIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
